MajorClaims.MC1: the advanced medical care brings with it more benefits than disadvantages
MajorClaims.MC2: the development of the health care system helps people have a better life

Claims.C1: the increase in life expectancy has some pressure on the Medicare system
Claims.C2: the improvement of medical care makes a better life for all people
Claims.C3: The main advantage of high-tech medical care is that people are better taken care so that they have a good health
Claims.C4: the increase in life expectancy puts a high pressure on the economic system
Claims.C5: It helps people build a sustainable society where people can live a happy life when they are old

Premises.P1: They can contribute effectively to the development of the economy
Premises.P2: healthy workers can create more productivity
Premises.P3: they do not have to spend more time in health checking or treatment
Premises.P4: this saves an amount of time as well as cost
Premises.P5: a community with the elderly who have a good health has a major role to play in a sustainable development of a society
Premises.P6: young people will be happy as their parents, grandparents are healthy
Premises.P7: more pension have to spend for Medicare instead of investing in other sectors of the economic system
Premises.P8: the capital that spend on taking care the elderly is contributed by these people during their working time
Premises.P9: they are worth to have good care
Premises.P10: They have given their effort to the society so that young people, the governments have a responsibility to improve the Medicare system
